items.name: Coward's Legacy
explicitMods: +18 to all Attributes
8% increased Movement Speed

Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

and experience true freedom.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts a buff that grants different bonuses to melee skills depending on your stance. Using the skill again alternates between Blood Stance and Sand Stance.

Melee Skills have 15% more Area of Effect while in Sand Stance

20% increased Projectile Attack Damage while in Blood Stance
20% increased Projectile Speed while in Sand Stance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
38% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 15% increased Fire Damage
Buff grants 12% more Spell Fire Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which adds lightning damage to spells and attacks. Cannot inflict Shock
Base duration is 6.00 seconds

I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra
